Package view

Class IOController

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.IOController
  • public class IOController
extends java.lang.Object
    This method contains utility functions for displaying and reading information to and from the console

      • readPassword

        public static java.lang.String readPassword​(java.lang.String message)

        message - the prompt for the input
        Returns:
        the read password

      • readBoolean

        public static boolean readBoolean​(java.lang.String message,
                                  java.lang.String yesString,
                                  java.lang.String noString)
        This method reads in a boolean by checking if the user returned the yesString or the noString
        Parameters:
        message - the prompt for the input
        yesString - the string for true
        noString - the string for false
        Returns:
        the read boolean
